Package: org.jlab.analysis

[Groovy] Class MCDecays

    • org.jlab.analysis.MCDecays 
    • @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class MCDecays
extends java.lang.Object

      Searches a hipo event for all unique MC::Lund decays for a given set of Lund pids. from a given decay chain.

      Version:
      1.0
      Authors:
      Matthew McEneaney

      • Constructor Detail

        • MCDecays(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> decay, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> parents, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> dpMap, HipoReader reader, Event event, Constants constants)

          Constructor stub

          Parameters:
          decay - Integer list of daughters for decay chain
          parents - Integer list of parents for decay chain
          dpMap - Integer list to map daughter to parent indices
          reader - HIPO file reader
          event - HIPO event
          constants - Physics constants object

      • Method Detail

        • protected void clean()

          Clear all lists. Hopefully will help with memory.

        • protected DecayProduct getBeam()

          Get beam as 0th entry from MC::Lund bank.

          Returns:
          beam

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> getChargeList()

          Access list of all possible decay particle combinations identified by charge.

          Returns:
          _chargeList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> getCheckedComboChargeList()

          Check list of all unique decay particle combinations identified by charge for matching parent/daughter index with combo in this._parComboChargeList. Relies on check in this.getChargeList() method that all combos come from same parent and corresponding check in this.getParChargeList().

          Returns:
          mergedComboChargeList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> getCheckedComboPidList()

          Check list of all unique decay particle combinations identified by Lund pid for matching parent/daughter index with combo in this._parComboPidList. Relies on check in this.getPidList() method that all combos come from same parent and corresponding check in this.getParPidList().

          Returns:
          mergedComboPidList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> getComboChargeList()

          Access list of all possible decay particle combinations identified by charge.

          Returns:
          _comboChargeList

          Returns:

        • protected void setChargeList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each charge in specified decay channel.

        • protected void setComboChargeList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all possible decay particle combinations in event. Relies on this._charges and this._chargeList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setComboPidList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all possible decay particle combinations in event. Relies on this._decay and this._pidList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setFullParticleList()

          Set full list of particles in event. (Used for pid tagging events.)

        • protected void setMatchingMap(java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> fullRecParticleList)

          Get index to index map to match REC::Particle bank entries to MC::Lund (final state) bank entries. Note that map entries map the actual index in REC::Particle bank (0->nparticles-1) (same as p_rec.index()) to the actual index (0->nparticles-1) in MC::Lund (not the same as p_mc.index())

          Parameters:
          fullRecParticleList - Full list of reconstructed particle for an event

        • protected void setParChargeList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each charge in specified parent channel.

        • protected void setParComboChargeList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all unique parent particle combinations in event. Relies on this._parCharges and this._parChargeList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setParComboPidList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all unique parent particle combinations in event. Relies on this._parents and this._parPidList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setParPidList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each pid in specified parent channel.

        • protected void setParticleList()

          Set list of particles for event matching pids in this._decay.

        • protected void setParticleListByCharge()

          Set list of particles for event matching charges in this._charges.

        • protected void setPidList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each pid in specified decay channel.
